title: Token Unlock & ROI Simulator
subtitle: Uncover real returns. Visualize token unlocks. Break free from FDV illusions.
description: Simulate your returns from any token presale, forecast token unlocks, and plan smarter exits under different market scenarios. Free, fast, and privacy-safe. Built by AlphaMind to protect retail investors.

investmentAmount.label: Investment Amount (USD)
investmentAmount.tooltip: The amount of money you invested in USD.

totalSupply.label: Total Token Supply
totalSupply.note: Add total supply to detect high FDV setups and unlock dilution.

tgeDate.label: TGE Date
tgeDate.note: If provided, results will show actual calendar dates

generatedSchedule.title: Generated Unlock Schedule
generatedSchedule.weekNote: Week numbers are calculated from TGE date

actions.simulateRoi: Instantly model your returns across different market conditions & unlock terms.

errors.investmentAmount: Investment amount is required and must be greater than 0
errors.tokenPrice: Token price is required and must be greater than 0
errors.tokenAmount: Token amount is required and must be greater than 0
errors.tgeUnlock: TGE unlock must be between 0 and 100
errors.scenarios: All scenarios must have a name and valid ROI
errors.unlockPeriods: All unlock periods must have a valid month and percentage
errors.email: Please enter a valid email address

tooltips.investmentAmount: The amount of money you invested in USD.
tooltips.tokenPrice: The price per token at which you purchased.
tooltips.tokenName: The name or symbol of the token.
tooltips.tokenAmount: The number of tokens you received.
tooltips.tgeUnlock: Percentage of tokens unlocked at Token Generation Event (launch).
tooltips.cliff: Number of months before tokens start unlocking.
tooltips.vestingDuration: Total duration of vesting period in months.
tooltips.expectedListingPrice: Expected TGE Price (optional): If known, this will be used as the base price for market ROI scenarios. If not provided, we assume listing price = your purchase price
tooltips.tgeDate: Token Generation Event date - when your tokens were first created and the vesting schedule began.
tooltips.totalSupply: The total number of tokens that will ever exist for this project. Used to calculate the Fully Diluted Valuation (FDV).
tooltips.generatedSchedule: This table shows the detailed unlock schedule for your tokens.
tooltips.period: The month/week number after TGE (Token Generation Event).
tooltips.percentage: The percentage of your total tokens that will unlock during this period.
tooltips.bearScenario: We assume your token trades at 90% below your presale price during your entire vesting period.
tooltips.baseScenario: No major price change. Token price stays near your purchase level.
tooltips.bullScenario: Market surges. We assume Token trades at a multiple of your presale price over your vesting period.

monthlyBreakdown.title: ROI Over Time
monthlyBreakdown.chartTooltip: This chart shows how your investment's ROI changes over time as tokens are unlocked. The lines represent different price scenarios.

breakdownTooltip.monthly: This table shows a detailed month-by-month breakdown of your investment's performance, including token unlocks, revenue, and cumulative ROI for each scenario.
breakdownTooltip.weekly: This table shows a detailed week-by-week breakdown of your investment's performance, including token unlocks, revenue, and cumulative ROI for each scenario.

period.title: Month
period.tooltip: The month number after TGE (Token Generation Event). If a TGE date was provided, actual calendar dates are shown in parentheses.
period.weekTooltip: The week number after TGE (Token Generation Event). If a TGE date was provided, actual calendar dates are shown in parentheses.

tokensUnlocked.title: Tokens Unlocked
tokensUnlocked.tooltip: The number of tokens that become available in this month according to your vesting schedule.
tokensUnlocked.weekTooltip: The number of tokens that become available in this week according to your vesting schedule.

revenue.title: Case Revenue
revenue.tooltip: The USD value of tokens unlocked in this month, calculated using the case price.
revenue.weekTooltip: The USD value of tokens unlocked in this week, calculated using the case price.

cumulativeRoi.title: Case ROI
cumulativeRoi.tooltip: Your total return on investment up to this month, calculated using the case price.
cumulativeRoi.weekTooltip: Your total return on investment up to this week, calculated using the case price.

advancedModeTeaser.title: Advanced mode coming soon:
advancedModeTeaser.features: partial exit strategy, VC unlock pressure, dynamic sell plans.

monthlyBreakdown.noData: No calculation data available. Please complete the calculator form first.
